caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, RESPONDENT, v. ERIC RENE DANIELS, APPELLANT.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division One.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for King County, No. 95-1-06109-1, Robert H. Alsdorf, J., entered February 9, 1996.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed by unpublished opinion per Webster, J., concurred in by Baker, C.J., and Kennedy, J.
